Class ResourceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.hms.dbmi.bd2k.irct.controller.ResourceController

  • public class ResourceController
extends java.lang.Object
    A stateless controller that provides access to all resources in the IRCT Application
    Author:
    Jeremy R. Easton-Marks
